metadata.title: CVE-2023-39318 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The html/template package does not properly handle HTML-like "" commenttokens, nor hashbang "#!" comment tokens, in <script> contexts. This maycause the template parser to improperly interpret the contents of <script>contexts, causing actions to be improperly escaped. This may be leveragedto perform an XSS attack.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
